review: My baby love it ...only thing I didn't see the free movies that supposes to been in the chromacast files
author: shalinda brown

review: I'm enjoying watching shows streamed through my Google Chromecast...does exactly what it says..I'll be ordering another one soon as a birthday present for my brother.
author: abraham barnes

review: Works pretty good.  Easy to set up.
author: Glen Meiring

review: Awful. Have had nothing but problems with this thing. The old saying "you get what you pay for" could never be more true. Spend the extra money and go with a Roku, never had issues and as reliable as it gets. Not to mention the more options and channels to choose from.
author: Jim Walsh

review: This device does all its suposed to and more. Possibilities are endless, only down fall is the wifi should be a/c not b/g to handle more bandwidth. The ease of use and setup as compared to smart tv apps or game consoles is hands down much better
author: Gerald G.
